name: MAGICAL DOROPIE
summary: The Krion Conquest, known in Japan as Magical Kids Doropie (まじかるキッズどろぴー Majikaru Kizzu Doropī?), or more simply Magical Doropie (まじかるどろぴー?), is a side-scrolling action-adventure video game for the Nintendo Entertainment System, developed by Vic Tokai in 1991. Later, Genki Mobile imported the game exclusively to Japanese mobile phones.
info:
• 中文名: 小魔女皮皮
  • 别名: 小魔女大冒险
  • 别名: まじかるキッズどろぴー
  • 别名: The Krion Conquest
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 1990-12-14
